data.eml:eml: A new genus of the family Portunidae (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura) and the identity of Portunus (Cycloachelous) yoronensis Sakai, 1974

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L. (2010): A new genus of the family Portunidae (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura) and the identity of Portunus (Cycloachelous) yoronensis Sakai, 1974. Zootaxa 2677: 38-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199230
